feed.title: OpenSign Releases

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v2.19.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes: - Permission denied for action addField on class _User

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v2.19.0...v2.19.1

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v2.19.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes: - fix: quick send not working

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v2.19.1...v2.19.2

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v2.20.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New Features: - Add Kiosk mode for in-person signing during events, conferences & trade fairs.

Bug Fixes: - Return HTTPS protocol URL for signing urls in APIs. - Change icon of duplicate template feature. - Date widget default format issue in APIs. - Invalid if user tries to save the signature from signature pad. - Update dependencies - Show proper error message to signers when a document is already deleted by the sender.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v2.19.0...v2.20.0

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v2.20.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes: - Handle error of date widget for default value

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v2.20.0...v2.20.1

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v2.21.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New Features: - Migrate to Vite from CRA - Credits are now consumed only when the first signer finishes signing using a public link

Bug Fixes: - 'isReadOnly' not working for text input widget in template flow - update dependencies

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v2.20.1...v2.21.0
